Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Patch front pockets, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some alpaca wool with patch pockets and ribbing around the neckline cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Sleeveless blouse woven in a cotton blend with decorative scalloped trims. Small collar and buttons down the front.
Sleeveless blouse woven in a cotton blend with decorative scalloped trims. Small collar and buttons down the front.
Fine-knit, V-neck jumper in a soft viscose blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with an elasticated neckline and smocked edges around the sleeves and hem.
Dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and concealed zip at the back. Asymmetric hem with flounces. Unlined.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups that maximise the bust for a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, lace detail at the back and a metal fastener at the front.
Fitted lace dress with short sleeves, a mesh yoke and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.

Lightly padded parka in rustle-weave fabric with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, unlined hood, and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets and large patch pockets with a flap at the front. Elasticated cuffs with a tab and button, and a drawstring hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Biker jacket with quilted shoulders, a tab with a press-stud at the neck and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a small decorative flap front pocket and long sleeves with sturdy ribbed jersey undersides and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Biker jacket with quilted shoulders, a tab with a press-stud at the neck and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a small decorative flap front pocket and long sleeves with sturdy ribbed jersey undersides and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Coat in felted fabric containing some wool with a high stand-up collar. Wrapover front with concealed press-studs, a tie-belt at the side with D-rings and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Padded jacket in a coated weave with a padded drawstring hood and small stand-up collar.  Zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lining in a contrasting colour.

Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some with alpaca wool with dropped shoulders and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
